SELECT COUNT(A.ROAD_NAME) FROM( SELECT cgslam.ROAD_NAME FROM MRT_TRF_FCLTS_STTS_ANLS mtfsa INNER JOIN C_GM_STD_LINK_ADSTDG_MPPG cgslam ON mtfsa.LINK_ID = cgslam.LINK_ID WHERE 1=1
